title.rendered: Angelonis II Restaurant Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA

content.rendered:
Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA

Angelonis II Restaurant Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA Address | Phone number | Email | Location | Opening hours, Amenities | Facilities

Address:
Angelonis II Restaurant Lounge,
2400 Arctic Ave, Atlantic City, NJ 08401, USA

Opening hours: Monday 11AM – 11PM, Tuesday 11AM – 11PM, Wednesday 11AM – 11PM, Thursday 11AM – 11PM, Friday 11AM – 1AM, Saturday 5PM – 1AM, Sunday 4 – 11PM.

Phone number:
1 609-344-7875

Email: angelonis2@comcast.net

View location of Angelonis II Restaurant Lounge – Lounge in Atlantic City NJ, USA on google maps

Angelonis II Restaurant Lounge – Lounge official website: http://angelonis.com/

Atlantic City International Airport FAA Code: ACY

Atlantic City International Airport ICAO Code: KACY

Atlantic City International Airport IATA Code: ACY
